    Class and Description
    com.centurylink.mdw.config.PaaSPropertyManager
    com.centurylink.mdw.workflow.adapter.PoolableAdapterBase
    Extend TextAdapterActivity whose name better describes its purpose. Adapter poolability is no longer a concept in MDW as we rely on underlying protocol pooling mechanisms.
